overview: Driven into isolation by alcohol and leeching friends, a bad job and a possessive girlfriend, a desperate artist is losing himself in the alluring illusion of a perfect love.  An illusion though, that triggers dreams and desires that lay forever dormant. It is the illusion of a perfect love, free of judgment and expectation. But can his love survive?  His past looms over his happiness like a dark cloud, soon to erupt.
title: Perfect Love
